p: Healthcare is critical to human beings. Accessible and high-quality primary care is an essential component of any national or regional healthcare system that aspires to be effective, efficient, and equitable. Primary care systems are also the foundation and key drivers of pandemic related emergency response and can serve as warning barometers for emergency response mechanisms [ 24, 25, 26, 27]. Therefore, the last “P” that we recommend adding to the original model is: “Primary Care”
